c: To install this package: Download the latest release of the VSIX installer for your version of Visual Studio from the Releases page of the project site. The package can be installed in Visual Studio 2019

Welcome to the Extended XML Documentation Comments Completion Provider project. This project is a Visual Studio editor extension that augments the standard C# XML documentation comments elements with custom

t: System Requirements and Building the Code
c: The master branch is for Visual Studio 2019 and later and is the default branch for all current and future development. In order to build the projects you will need Visual Studio 2019 or later. Folder
Changes made in this release: Added the self-closing option to the see and seealso elements. See Also Other Resources Version History
